text: Prince Rahim Aga Khan (born 12 October 1971), known as the Aga Khan V, is the 50th Imam, or Hazar Imam, of the Shia Nizari Isma'ili Muslims since 2025. He is the second of the Aga Khan IV's four children. He replaced his father upon his death on 4 February 2025. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:People from Geneva Category:Imams Category:Princes and princesses
title: Aga Khan V
